reviewText:
These videos are broken down well, however the actual practitioners are not doing the narration so it is a little off in terms of audio instruction. However, this is a good video for both beginner and advanced students. I have gone over it a few times now and have added a few of these drills to my own Arnis system.

Study Everything!

The dvd I ordered kept skipping and would not play clearly. Although everyone i spoke to was very open and willing to resolve the issue, i felt as though the process for return should have been more simplistic. I just wanted another video not money back. Overall, amazon is still good to order through.
